error.signature: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 503

verdict.summary: Container's readiness probe is failing â€” Kubernetes won't send traffic to the pod.

dead_ends.why_fails: All traffic goes to unready pods; users see 500 errors

dead_ends.action: Setting the probe to check a path that always returns 200
dead_ends.why_fails: Defeats the purpose of readiness checks

workarounds.action: Check the health endpoint inside the container: kubectl exec <pod> -- curl localhost:<port>/health
workarounds.how: Verify the app is actually responding on the probed path

workarounds.action: Adjust probe timing: increase initialDelaySeconds, periodSeconds, failureThreshold
workarounds.how: Slow-starting apps need longer initial delay

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Readiness probe failed' indicates a failing readiness probe, while 'ImagePullBackOff' indicates failure to pull a container image.
